name: Stirling Square Capital Partners
overview: Stirling Square Capital Partners has become a leading European mid-market private equity firm with an established position in complex, cross border buy-out transactions. Whilst their investment team has grown steadily together with their investment activities and capital under management, they retain the essential spirit of their founding partners: highly motivated individuals who enjoy working together in an entrepreneurial environment.
